synopsis.text: The third world presents a serene life for Gasai Yuno, filled with warmth from her loving parents and camaraderie from her school friends. However, a lingering void in her heart hints at a forgotten figure of immense importance. After a seemingly ordinary class trip to the beach, Yuno encounters enigmatic messages from an unidentifiable voice, hinting at the existence of a cherished individual she must find. With unwavering determination, Yuno traverses a mysterious realm, overcoming numerous hurdles in her quest to reunite with her beloved, whose memory eludes her grasp.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
